name: This Is Fine (LukeDaaDuke)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

E - Interact

Esc - Pause

Gameplay:

You are in a house that's burning down. Keep the fire away and find a way to extinguish the fire

Control the fire-spread with your fire extinguisher with limited fuel

Find more fuel in cabinets around your house

Find maps around the house to find special locations

Credits:

Game was made in Godot

Art was made in Pyxel Edit

Sound effects made with LabChirp

Ambience - 

Made for the BenBonk Game Jam
